body.p: Native of Kentucky. Married Martha Ann Glover on October 31, 1854 in Jefferson County. Involved with the foundry owned by his father-in-law in 1860. Later worked as a tobacco dealer in Louisville.

Spouse: Martha Ann Hikes (Glover)
Children: Annie Hike
